name: Kool Fellas, Ltd. - Photography by Dirk Behlau
description:
* Signed copy by Dirk Behlau with extra sticker pack * 
* PRICE INCL. SHIPPING WITHIN EUROPE *

"Dirk Behlau is back with another mind-blowing masterpiece!" Jesse James (West Coast Choppers)

"Kool Fellas, Ltd. is a feast for the eyes, a great coffee table book for the casual observer or a pictorial textbook for the student of kustom kulture." Alan Mayes (Ol´Skool Rodz Magazine)

"Kool Fellas, Ltd." is the third Hot Rod/Kustom Kulture book by photographer / designer
Dirk "The Pixeleye" Behlau - internationally acclaimed for his authentic kool lifestyle photography and author of the photobooks "Speed Kings" and "Hotrod Empire, Inc."

Kool Fellas Ltd. is a stylish statement for all the coffee table book lovers who are into great athmospheric high-class photography combined with a big blend of Rock´n´Roll attitude. Kool Fellas, Ltd. is full of cool guys & gals, Hot Rods, Kustom Kulture, Pin-Ups, Custombikes, Tattoo Artists, Garages, Pinstripers, Musicians and much more - you can nearly smell and feel the dust and gasoline...shot in USA & Europe!

Titel: Kool Fellas, Ltd. -  Photography by Dirk Behlau
Foreword by Jesse James of West Coast Choppers

152 pages, about 400 photos, colour & b/w
Size: 28x20 cm, Landscape format, Hardcover
Language: English

Release Date: Halloween // 31.10.2010
Publisher: Huber Verlag GmbH & Co. KG
ISBN: 978-3-927896-35-2
Web: www.koolfellas.com, www.facebook.com/koolfellas

name: Kustom Kamera - Greased Up Eye Candy
description:
* PRICE INCL. SHIPPING WITHIN EUROPE *

A photographic poke in the eye as you peek under the hood of kustom kulture. Let 12 international photographers take you on a road trip through a vintage landscape, where the women wear stockings and speak in seductive whiskey-stained whispers, and the men, hard and mean, burn rubber through your imagination.

With more beautifully produced, adrenalin-soaked pages of visceral eye-popping images, this collection is a must-have for all the greasers, hot rodders, and kustom artists who loved Kustom Graphics, as well as fans of stunning cutting-edge photography. 

The nine photographers profiled:
Laurent BAGNARD
Dirk BEHLAU
Shannon BROOKE
Richard HEEPS
Chas Ray KRIDER
April MAY
Gayla PARTRIDGE
Dave PERRY
Roy VARGA
Viva VAN STORY
Adam WRIGHT

Biographies of every artist are included, as well as detailed captions for each work and an extensive contact section.

Written by Antony Duma Introduction by Yak El-Droubie
ISBN: 978-0-9558336-4-9
Hardcover + jacket, 208 pages
Language: Englisch
254 mm (h) x 216 mm (w)
Korero Books

name: Hotrod Empire, Inc. - Photography by Dirk Behlau
description:
* Signed copy by Dirk Behlau with extra sticker pack *
* PRICE INCL. SHIPPING WITHIN EUROPE *

Welcome to Hotrod Empire, Inc.!
This volume of photography at hand is a portrait of the european old-school Hot Rod & Kustom Kulture scene. Besides Hot Rods & Kustoms, rockabilly-, rockabella- and rock´n´roller lifestyle takes center stage, because the old-school Hot-Rod scene consists of more than driving an old jalopy. 

It´s the rock´n´roll spirit, the kick-ass punkrock, the psychobilly, it´s about freedom and fuck-off attitude. A bow to ancient times, linked with fun and melancholia, beautiful classic pin-ups instead of modern fashion victims and fading mayflies. That is what it´s all about.

About the people, the art and the rock´n´roll lifestyle apart from ordinary trends, which are dictated by the media. The spirit of the 50´s and 60´s, friendship, value and party. People, doing their thing, shouting out „fuck the world“! And many other things, that you can´t explain in a few lines. Therefore, less text, more photos explaining themselves. Thank you all, you know who you are!

"The combination of hot rods, kustoms, and pin up models is sure a fine winner - afteral you are holding an issue of Garage in your hands, aren´t you? Well imaging a 128 page coffee table book of nothing but page after page of photos of that subject matter and each and every one is suitable for framing. We could only imagine the volume of photos that Dirk Behlau had to omit to shrink his selection down to fit inside this book. What we wouldn´t give to see the world through Dirk´s lens just for one day." 
Review by Jesse James (West Coast Choppers) in Garage Magazine #19 (USA)

name: Speed Kings - Racing Photography by Dirk Behlau
description:
* Signed copy by Dirk Behlau with extra sticker pack *
* PRICE INCL. SHIPPING WITHIN EUROPE *

Drag Racing is a down-to-earth form of motor sport that is both accessible and affordable. It fascinates an ever-growing community of fans around the world.

This has partly to do with the sport itself, but certainly also with drag racing´s very individual brand of aesthetics when it comes to cars and the people who drive, repair and admire them. Drag racing is a mix of uproariously loud, primordial displays of power and high-tech; it drivers love the sport but flirt openly with destruction and putting their lives in danger.

Spreed Kings presents photographs by Dirk Behlau that skilfully capture the adrenalin-fuelled athmosphere of suspense on  and alongside the track, as well as the eroticism of the machines and the people who give their lives for a few seconds of the ultimate kick.

Start your engines!

Speed Kings
Racing Photography by Dirk Behlau
Pages: 128
Size: 26x18 cm
Release: 16. August 2007 / Published by Die Gestalten
